summary.span: 實作 .aspx 檔案的剖析器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用這個類別來剖析.aspx 頁面。ASP.NET uses this class to parse .aspx pages.

MemberSignature.Value: public PageParser ();

Public Sub New ()
public: PageParser();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定頁面剖析期間要使用的預設值。This constructor sets default values to be used during page parsing.

public: static property Type ^ DefaultApplicationBaseType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定衍生 執行個體的型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type from which the instance is derived.

value.span: 衍生 執行個體的型別。

span.span: The type from which the instance is derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該在 Global.asax 檔案之前存取`PreApplicationStart`就會發生事件。This property should be accessed in the Global.asax file before the `PreApplicationStart` event occurs.

public: static property Type ^ DefaultPageBaseType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定所有頁面的衍生來源基底型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type from which all pages are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只能設定之前`PreApplicationStart`Global.asax 檔中就會發生事件。This property can only be set before the `PreApplicationStart` event occurs in the Global.asax file. 隨時都可以讀取這個屬性。This property can be read at any time.

span.span: The type of the page parser filter.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool EnableLongStringsAsResources { get; set; }
.property bool EnableLongStringsAsResources
Public Shared Property EnableLongStringsAsResources As Boolean
public: static property bool EnableLongStringsAsResources { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 ASP.NET 是否應該對 ASP.NET 剖析頁面或控制項時遇到的長字串進行其內部處理的最佳化。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ASP.NET should optimize its internal handling of long strings that are encountered when ASP.NET parses a page or control.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 應該對其長字串的內部處理進行最佳化則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if ASP.NET should optimize its internal handling of long strings; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，ASP.NET 網頁剖析器將轉換成暫存資源字串包含 256 或多個字元的常值字串。By default, the ASP.NET page parser converts literal strings that contain 256 or more characters into a temporary resource string. 這個屬性可以設定為`false`才能停用此行為，而將常值字串直接寫入回應資料流。This property can be set to `false` in order to disable this behavior and instead to write the literal string directly to the response stream. 這個屬性只能在 Global.asax 檔案之前設定`PreApplicationStart`就會發生事件。This property can only be set in the Global.asax file before the `PreApplicationStart` event occurs. 隨時都可以讀取這個屬性。This property can be read at any time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.IHttpHandler GetCompiledPageInstance (string virtualPath, string inputFile, System.Web.HttpContext context);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.IHttpHandler GetCompiledPageInstance(string virtualPath, string inputFile, class System.Web.HttpContext context) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCompiledPageInstance (virtualPath As String, inputFile As String, context As HttpContext) As IHttpHandler
public: static System::Web::IHttpHandler ^ GetCompiledPageInstance(System::String ^ virtualPath, System::String ^ inputFile, System::Web::HttpContext ^ context);

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 所要求之檔案的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path of the requested file.
The physical path of the page.

param.name: context
param.span: 包含目前 Web 要求之相關資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that contains information about the current Web request.

summary.span: 針對特定虛擬路徑傳回已編譯頁面的執行個體。

span.span: Returns an instance of a compiled page for the specific virtual path.

returns.span: 傳回所要求之頁面的已編譯執行個體。

span.span: Returns the compiled instance of the requested page.
